Latent Dirichlet Allocation Time Series (LDATS)

Juniper L. Simonis

Source: vignettes/LDATS_codebase.Rmd
LDATS_codebase.Rmd

Overview

This vignette details the code base for the LDATS package. It was constructed using LDATS version 0.0.17 on 2018-12-16.

Installation

To obtain the most recent version of LDATS, install the most recent version from GitHub:

install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("weecology/LDATS")

Analytical Pipeline

The full LDATS analysis can be executed using the LDA_TS function, which is the top-level of the coding pipeline’s hierarchy of functions:

  • LDA_TS
    • LDA_set
      • LDA
    • select_LDA
    • TS_on_LDA
      • expand_TS
      • TS
        • est_changepoints
        • est_regressors
        • summarize_TS
    • select_TS
    • package_LDA_TS

The component functions can all be run independently, as well.
